title: Experts Are Warning That ‘AI Swarms’ Could Spark Disruptions to Democracy
description: Artificial intelligence is a powerful business tool, but also packs the potential for serious civic harm.
content:
AI researchers are already warning that upcoming election seasons could be rife with AI-powered misinformation campaigns capable of threatening democracy.

title: The Best AI-First Lead Generation Tools to Know in 2025
description: In 2025, lead generation no longer means manually building lists and hoping for replies. Artificial intelligence now plays a central role in finding, qualifying, and engaging prospects faster and more accurately, especially for B2B teams and growth-oriented businesses. Smart AI tools reduce manual toil, predict buyer intent, and automate outreach at scale, helping sales and marketing teams focus on converting high-value opportunities.
